tip.event: (Default) Everything which has to do with the music. E.g. play started, ended, stream title changed, volume changed, etc.
tip.websocket: Peek into the WebSocket traffic between Node-RED and the Mopidy server.
tip.state: The state of a Mopidy server changes, eg a server goes offline/online.
tip.reconnect: Events sent when Node-RED is trying to connect to a Mopidy server.
